programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2022
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2022!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Uncle King - Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep66
programme.desc: Julien 2.0 - King Julien wants a doover to become King JULIEN 2.0 and actually listen to his people. But when everyone feels their voice is the most important the kingdom becomes a chaotic mess

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep15
programme.desc: Cyrano - Brian downloads some sketchy software that promises to make him cool. It works out great and everyones happy! (JK, its a huge disaster.)

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep16
programme.desc: Paradise Found - Sometimes you land on an unexplored planet and wonderful, magical things happen. Then after a while youre like, wait, is something wrong? Yes, something is definitely wrong.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep68
programme.desc: The S. S. Friend-ship - After the PALs encourage Maricela to make new friends, she forms the exclusive "Poshy Posse" with Priya, Sahir and Alex.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep69
programme.desc: The Gavel of Justice - Someone stole Bebe's gavel and used it to break a window at the academy! Everyone seems to suspect Alex ... but Pru is certain he's innocent.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over / Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep53
programme.desc: Living On The Edge - With their enemies defeated and the volcano erupting on Dragon's Edge, the riders decide to return to Berk but Hiccup discovers that the Dragon Hunters are still out there

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep27
programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berrys family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: Legend of the Boneknapper Ep1
programme.desc: Legend Of The Boneknapper Dragon - Hiccup and the gang join Gobber on a quest to find a legendary boneknapper dragon.

programme.title: Gift of the Night Fury Ep1
programme.desc: Dragons:Gift Of The Night Fury - As the village of Berk prepares for its winter holiday, the resident dragons all inexplicably fly away.

programme.title: Book of Dragons Ep1
programme.desc: Book Of Dragons - Join Hiccup and his friends as they explore and add to their primary reference about dragons.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dragon Racers Ep1
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Dragon Racers - The "How to Train Your Dragon" adventure continues when a hunt for lost sheep turns into a fierce, fun-filled competition.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep2
programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep27
programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep27
programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berrys family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep27
programme.desc: Bootless Cries - After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep92
programme.desc: Fly High Primrose - Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep93
programme.desc: Lovelorn Slugsy - Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi's Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What's Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Olivia Ep5
programme.desc: Olivia Takes A Road Trip - On the looooong drive to Grandma's house, Olivia finds ways to pass the time. She imagines her family traveling in style, as she pilots her very own jumbo jetOlivia Air! By the time they arrive at Grandma's, Olivia's had so much fun that the discomfort of the road trip has been forgotten.

programme.title: Olivia Ep6
programme.desc: Olivia Goes International - When asked to give a presentation for her class's International Day. Olivia can't decide which country to choose. Being Olivia she invents her own country Olivitania -where cupcakes are the national food and the national anthem sounds suspiciously like Puccini.

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secrethe's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep6

But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa's Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Operation Dad - Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep257
programme.desc: Handemonium / Breakin' - Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more!

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Age of Evolution Pt. 1 - Twitch and Thrash wonder if they're the only two Terrans in the universe. With the help of Optimus, Bumblebee, Alex, Robby, and Mo, they relocate the cave of their origin and find much more than the Emberstone.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Back to Nature/Okey-Dokey! - When Vanity, Poet and Dimwitty get lost in the forest, Papa Smurf sends them to Wild for nature lessons. // Jokey has a new prank: giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say "okey dokey" to every request.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Smurfy Magic Duel/Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb - Papa Smurf wants to prove to Willow that alchemy is more powerful than her "natural" magic. // Brainy's new brain-weighing invention backfires and leaves him brainless.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Shell Game/Blossom Goes Wild! - Gargamel turns himself into a snail so Farmer will bring him back to the Smurfs' Village. // When Blossom gets into a fight with Storm and Lily, she leaves her village and moves into the forest with Wild

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Monstering - Human girl, Clawdeen, follows her instincts and discovers Monster High!/When Clawdeen isn't allowed into Monster High because she's human, she devises other ways to get into school

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep176
programme.desc: Super Evil Aquatic Villian Team Up is Go! / Chum Fricassee - Plankton teams up with Man Ray to take over the Krusty Krab and then-the world! Hahahahahaha! // Squidward quits the Krusty Krab to work for Plankton, turning the Chum Bucket into an overnight success.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep213
programme.desc: The Getaway / Lost and Found - When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson. // When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep214
programme.desc: Patrick's Coupon / Out of the Picture - Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it! // Krabs buys Squidward's art, but to make a profit on his purchase he'll have to get the artist out of the picture!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Maybe-Sitter - With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Fish Talker / Wet Doom - Captain Man and Kid Danger use Schowz' Fish-Talker helmet to help a lost fish find his way home. // While stuck in a restaurant bathroom, Ray, Henry, Charlotte, Jasper, and Schwoz reminisce about past adventures.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Sushi Sitter / Cheer Beast - Captain Man must save Kid Danger from Drillfinger with the only tool he has: a motorized toilet. // Prepping for cheer tryouts, Piper tries out Captain Man's now-discontinued health program but when she turns into a beast the heroes must stop her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting / Alvin's Assistant - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old. // Kevin agrees to be Alvin's assistant to get closer to the music industry, but ends up running errands instead.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Mysterions / The Crow That Ate My Homework - When Theodore discovers Alvin and Simon have a secret club, he promises not to tell anyone if they let him join. // Dave promises to take Alvin to a water park if he gets a good grade on his test, but then a crow steals it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Snooze Pods / Sticky Vicky - Jasper becomes trapped in a dream using one of Schwoz's Snooze Pods. It's up to Captain Man & Kid Danger to bring him back. // Henry's field trip to the Museum of Celebrity Garbage is cut short by the arrival of Sticky Vicky.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Return to New York - The Turtles return to the city to search for Splinter, only to find that the city is overrun with Kraang.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 20 - Geelong v Fremantle Ep114
programme.desc: It's a long road trip for Fremantle as they travel to Geelong to face the reigning Premiers. With 4 rounds to go the Cats have stormed into contention for a possible top four finish, while the Dockers' finals hopes seem over.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 20 - Gold Coast Suns v Brisbane Lions Ep115
programme.desc: It's one of the newest rivalries in the AFL as Gold Coast host Brisbane in a Q-Clash. The Suns under interim coach Steven King host their intrastate cousin the Lions who are looking to catch the Top 2 and earn a home final.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 20 - Adelaide v Port Adelaide Ep116
programme.desc: It's a South Australian Showdown as Adelaide take on Port Adelaide. With only four rounds to come, the Power are fighting for top spot while the Crows are in a logjam of teams battling for a top 8 finish and a finals spot.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Reptile Realm Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - There's more to Australia's reptiles than being cold-blooded killers. Aaron Pedersen explores intimate mating rituals and protective mothers as we scratch beneath the scales of our reptiles.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep13
programme.desc: With teams crisscrossing the globe, Foreign Correspondent is back with a new season exploring the world with stories from Bollywood to Baghdad to Barbados. We showcase the very best in international reporting. (Return)

programme.title: Etoa: A Kokoda Story
programme.desc: Seventy-five years after the horrors of the Pacific War, the forgotten perspectives of the local people emerge as a crew of archeologists arrive in remote Papua New Guinea in search of the remains of lost soldiers.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep25
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep60
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Rookie Justin tackles a deal that could make or break him. The Boulder Boys race to save their claim from a monsoon flood. Plus on their last dig of the season The Cooke Brothers finally hit pay dirt.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep25
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Landline Ep24
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep26
programme.desc: Could Australia be heading into a recession under the weight of aggressive interest rate rises from the Reserve Bank? All eyes will be on the RBA's August rates decision to see how it deals with inflation and slowing growth.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep26
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep28
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents a weekly roundup of stories filed by the ABC's international correspondents posted across the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India, Indonesia and more.

programme.title: Next Gen Agriculture - Cattle Kids Ep1
programme.desc: Twenty years ago rural leaders were alarmed by young people's perceived declining interest in rural jobs and lives. But as this episode of Landline's Next Gen Agriculture series shows, it's a different story now.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Julie Bishop - Chancellor of the ANU and Former Foreign Minister Ep26
programme.desc: Julie Bishop, Chancellor of the ANU and Former Minister for Foreign Affairs, addresses the National Press Club on the topic "Megatrends in a rapidly changing global environment".

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep31
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.desc: The Matildas inspire generations of football stars and captivate the imagination of a nation, theirs is a legacy dating back to 1978. Tracey Holmes spoke to some Matildas alumni about what it means to wear the green and gold.

programme.desc: The Premiers from 2017, 2019 and 2020 Richmond take on 2021 Premiers Melbourne in Round 20. The Tigers are one of 14 teams fighting for a top 8 spot while the Demons are battling Brisbane and Geelong for a spot in the top 4.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep61

programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Guest presenter Lisa Millar takes us on a journey along Victoria's spectacular Great South West Walk. Hiking the 250km trail is a chance to connect with nature but, as Lisa discovers, the experience can also be life changing.

programme.title: Our Law
programme.desc: At Western Australia's first Indigenous run Police Station, two Noongar officers must learn Yarnangu Lore and master the Ngaanyatjarra language, if they are to effectively police one of the most remote beats in the world.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After another heist by the Kelly Gang, Jay pieces together their identities and uncovers their hideout. Anousha finds an unexpected detail of the police investigation into Josh's death and suddenly finds herself in danger.

programme.title: The China Century - Unify The Motherland Ep3

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Tasmania is the backdrop for our latest episode, where presenter Jane Hall accompanies Sydney resident Frances on a tour of Launceston's real estate market. Can Frances find what her heart desires?

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Lindy Chamberlain Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Anh is joined by Lindy Chamberlain. Her wrongful conviction for the death of her daughter Azaria in 1980, taken by a dingo from their campsite, is etched into our national psyche. Can Anh capture her strength and humanity?

programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep151
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep151
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Reptile Realm Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - There's more to Australia's reptiles than being cold-blooded killers. Aaron Pedersen explores intimate mating rituals and protective mothers as we scratch beneath the scales of our reptiles.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Rookie Justin tackles a deal that could make or break him. The Boulder Boys race to save their claim from a monsoon flood. Plus on their last dig of the season The Cooke Brothers finally hit pay dirt.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab - Homelessness Rises Amid Australia's National Housing Crisis Ep11
programme.desc: Demand for social housing is rising while more people are struggling to afford their rental properties, and supply is dwindling. We meet three people lost in the frenzy for an increasingly hard-to-find commodity - a home.

programme.title: Landline Ep25
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep131
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep151
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep136
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep151
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep117
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep151
programme.desc: More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep105
programme.desc: Will we see an unlucky 13th interest rate rise after the Reserve Bank meet tomorrow? The RBA kept rates on hold in July as the economy slows and consumer spending and confidence fell despite low unemployment.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep151
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep13
programme.desc: With teams crisscrossing the globe, Foreign Correspondent is back with a new season exploring the world with stories from Bollywood to Baghdad to Barbados. We showcase the very best in international reporting. (Return)

programme.title: The World Ep151
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Q+A Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 16 - Australia's leading forum for public debate, Q+A is a key part of ABC's unbeatable Monday news and current affairs line-up. A panel of politicians, experts and thought leaders bring unique perspectives to your questions.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep117
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep151
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Samurai Castles - Matsumoto Castle
programme.desc: Matsumoto Castle with its black-lacquered keep is famous for its photogenic visage. History buff Chris Glenn uncovers how it evolved during the transition from a period of civil war to times of peace.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Tsubo-niwa, life enhanced by quintessential spaces. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: ultra-high-speed elevators & carton filling machines.

programme.title: Bosai:Lava Flows
programme.desc: The hazard map for Mt. Fuji was revised in 2021, revealing the possibility of greater damage from lava flows. We'll look at what lies behind those assumptions and what countermeasures can be taken.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Pythagora Equipment Academy"...

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Here's a lot to like about Japanese cuisine other than sushi, including its core ingredient-rice. In this special episode, see how Japanese rice is taking the world by storm.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Rene Goes To School
programme.desc: Rene, a Cameroonian manga creator who grew up in Japan, meets high schooler Heshike Hideki from Peru, who wants to become a caregiver. We follow the two as they bond over family and create a manga.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: One of Japan's leading resort areas, Okinawa. In the middle of Koza Music Town, a piano is placed for a limited period. Watch players from all walks of life come to share their melodies.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov
